Home → Parents, carers and children → Advent calendar 2017

Suffolk Libraries children's book advent calendar 2017

Read your way to Christmas! Every day until Christmas Eve, stock librarian Sophie recommends one of our brilliant new Christmas books for children.

December 1

The 12 Days of Christmas, by Pilgrim Lee

Today's book is The 12 Days of Christmas, by Pilgrim Lee.

December 2

The Twelve Days of Christmas, by Britta Teckentrup

Today's book is The Twelve Days of Christmas, by Britta Teckentrup.

December 3

Dr. Tenth: Christmas Surprise!, by Roger Hargreaves

Today's book is Dr. Tenth: Christmas Surprise!, by Roger Hargreaves.

December 4

Barry Loser's Christmas Joke Book, by James Smith

Today's book is Barry Loser's Christmas Joke Book, by James Smith.

December 5

Father Christmas Heard a Parp, by Olaf Falafel

Today's book is Father Christmas Heard a Parp, by Olaf Falafel.

December 6

Stanley's Christmas Adventure, by Jeff Brown & Rob Biddulph

Today's book is Stanley's Christmas Adventure, by Jeff Brown & Rob Biddulph.

December 7

The Princess and the Christmas Rescue, by Caryl Hart & Sarah Warburton

Today's book is The Princess and the Christmas Rescue, by Caryl Hart & Sarah Warburton.

December 8

Lucy's Magical Surprise, by Anne Booth

Today's book is Lucy's Magical Surprise, by Anne Booth.

December 9

Merry Christmas, Hugless Douglas, by David Melling

Today's book is Merry Christmas, Hugless Douglas, by David Melling.

December 10

Nadiya's Bake Me a Festive Story: thirty festive recipes and stories for children, by Nadiya Hussain & Clair Rossiter

Today's book is Nadiya's Bake Me a Festive Story: thirty festive recipes and stories for children, by Nadiya Hussain & Clair Rossiter.

December 11

Jingle Bells!, by Tracey Corderoy & Steven Lenton

Today's book is Jingle Bells!, by Tracey Corderoy & Steven Lenton.

December 12

Horrid Henry's Christmas, by Francesca Simon & Tony Ross

Today's book is Horrid Henry's Christmas, by Francesca Simon & Tony Ross.

December 13

A Kitten Called Holly, by Helen Peters & Ellie Snowden

Today's book is A Kitten Called Holly, by Helen Peters & Ellie Snowden.

December 14

Christmas Dinner of Souls, by Ross Montgomery

Today's book is Christmas Dinner of Souls, by Ross Montgomery.

December 15

I Killed Father Christmas, by Anthony McGowan & Chris Riddell

Today's book is I Killed Father Christmas, by Anthony McGowan & Chris Riddell.

December 16

One Christmas Wish, by Katherine Rundell & Emily Sutton

Today's book is One Christmas Wish, by Katherine Rundell & Emily Sutton.

December 17

Can Doctor Proctor Save Christmas?, by Jo Nesbø

Today's book is Can Doctor Proctor Save Christmas?, by Jo Nesbø.

December 18

There's a Dragon in my Stocking!, by Tom Nicoll & Sarah Horne

Today's book is There's a Dragon in my Stocking!, by Tom Nicoll & Sarah Horne.

December 19

The Accidental Father Christmas, by Tom McLaughlin

Today's book is The Accidental Father Christmas, by Tom McLaughlin.

December 20

Top Elf, by Caleb Zane Huett

Today's book is Top Elf, by Caleb Zane Huett.

December 21

Bah! Humbug!, by Michael Rosen & Tony Ross

Today's book is Bah! Humbug!, by Michael Rosen & Tony Ross.

December 22

Hetty Feather's Christmas, by Jacqueline Wilson & Nick Sharratt

Today's book is Hetty Feather's Christmas, by Jacqueline Wilson & Nick Sharratt.

December 23

Father Christmas and Me, by Matt Haig & Chris Mould

Today's book is Father Christmas and Me, by Matt Haig & Chris Mould.

December 24

It's the final day of our children's advent calendar!

As it's the last day, we've got TWO books. Click through to see what they are!
